replace_string.title: Replace string
replace_string.description: Set the string that should replace a dot (".") in all column names that contain the replacement string. For example, with the replace string set to __, the column contact__address will be sent to Salesforce as contact.address.

upsert_field_name.title: External ID
upsert_field_name.description: Specify which column in the input table is used an External ID for the upsert operation. Values in the External ID column must be unique. More information on importing with External IDs can be found in the Salesforce documentation.

assignment_id.title: Assignment ID
assignment_id.description: The ID of the Lead Assignment Rule you want to apply after import. See how to find it.

serial_mode.title: Serial mode
serial_mode.description: Run batches in serial mode. This helps prevent locks on objects but significantly increases run time.

override_batch_size.title: Batch size override
override_batch_size.description: Enable this option to override the batch size. If disabled, the batch size is estimated based on data size. Manual batch size adjustment is not recommended.

batch_size.title: Batch size
batch_size.description: Defines the batch size. The maximum is 10,000 in serial mode, while in standard mode, the limit is 100MB. Reduce this value if you experience connection errors. Manual adjustment is not recommended.
